P002833.project_name: Rural Development in Cotton Areas Project (01)

project_abstract.cdata: The Rural Development in Cotton Area Project for Togo will strengthen Societe Togolaise du Coton (SOTOCO) by providing: buildings and equipment for SOTOCO headquarter and field services (including establishment of a seed multiplication and field trials system; additional management and field staff, training and related operating expenses; providing ox-cultivation training and credit to farmers for acquisition of ox-drawn equipment; expanding the project monitoring and evaluation unit within the Ministry of Rural Development; building and improving about 700 km of feeder roads; providing incremental on-farm inputs to expand improved cotton planting by 20,000 ha; improved maize by 13,700 ha; improved sorghum by 7,500 ha; and improved groundnuts by 2,700 ha.
